name: Crime Chase 2016 – Dog Rescue Missions, Patrol Police Car Action With real Police Lights and Sirens
name_original: Crime Chase 2016 – Dog Rescue Missions, Patrol Police Car Action With real Police Lights and Sirens
description:
Welcome to the Badland with the highest rate of criminals. You are the City Cop hired to clean the city from criminals with your faithful trained dog.

You found a stray dog and gave it complete police training. It’s time to professionally licence the stray dog as a police dog. Drive the dog to the various Dog rescue missions and see some real action when It sniffs and chases the criminal.

Drive to the crime scene as fast as you can and let the dog catch the criminals and attack them. Arrest them all. Don’t let them escape. Download the Crime Chase 2016 today.

Give us Feedback and try our other games on
